WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
Parsing some sample websites, i received an error saying body element not found.
I have downloaded the page giving me the error and modified it until body element is not null.
 
HtmlNode oBody = objDocument.DocumentNode.SelectSingleNode("//body");
 
It appears that if a <script> tag is closed with </SCRIPT> instead of </script>, agility pack can't understand the following <body> tag.
It also appends this to ParseErrors with the "Start tag <body> was not found" string.
 
The error disappears when the tag closure matches by case.
WorkItem.Summary: Body element not found if mismatched tags are used in Head

Comments.Message: Fixed file attached, the only difference is "</SCRIPT>" is changed into "</script>".
